cab.content: OiB IBE I .HOME AJfEAIRS COMMITTEE,"Jf. . n . A ' %THE SCHOOL TSlOEERS'. SUPEHAEIitJATIOfl BILL.(Mote by the President of the,. Board, of Education. ) [Circulated with reference to H0A.C. 4 (24), Conclusion 2,I conferred with the Chancellor of the Exchequer and tho Secretary for Scotland on Tuesday, the 4th March, with regard to this Bill. It was agreed that the Bill should now go forward with the alteration of 1st April, 1925, for the 1st August, 1926, subject to it being ascertained that air James Yoxall would be satisfied with the earlier date. It has subsequently been ascertained that Sir James Yoxall takes no exception to this date, and I am accordingly taking steps for bringing in the Bill as soon as possible.(Intd.) c.t..Board of Education, March 6th, 1924.
